ground_truth: Steam leaks off the window as doe-eyed Sidney stares open-mouthed at the passing illuminations, while the glowing peaks of skyscrapers gleam in the night sky. White flowers float on the surface of the rooftop swimming pool as immaculately dressed glitterati mingle and sip champagne. Sidney saunters over to Alison carrying a plate piled high with finger foods, as three beautiful women slink by, and Lawrence walks off into the crowd. Party guests whip out their mobile phones in response to the ring tone, and a glamorous woman in her fifties approaches heavy-featured, debonair Lawrence. Lawrence drifts off with goateed Vincent, as Sidney approaches Rachel, who stands by herself looking out over the city. She looks at him suspiciously, but then, beaming, she puts down her champagne. Sidney hands her a napkin and a pen, and she hands him her autograph, making Sidney grin as he rejoins the others. Eleanor gestures to a besuited young man on the opposite side of the pool, who dutifully taps Sophie on the shoulder, and she turns to face Eleanor. Sophie is resplendent in a backless white halter-neck dress, causing Sidney's jaw to drop, while Eleanor waits for her to join them. Pulling up to the poolside, Sophie looks around for an appropriate route but is hemmed in by guests absorbed in conversation. Smiling, she scratches her head, then kicks off her glittering high heels before stepping fully clothed into the pool. Photographers take pictures as she lifts her sleek, jet-black hair over her head and wades gracefully towards Eleanor, clutching her long hair in a bun and smiling flirtatiously for the camera. She pulls herself up out of the water, her wet dress clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean, shapely body, as Eleanor speaks on her cell phone as they leave. Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside, where a bustling crowd of press photographers ask for Sophie's attention, and Sidney shields his eyes from the glare of the flashing cameras and puts a coat over Sophie's shoulders as they head towards a waiting car. Sidney tries to squeeze into the car beside Sophie and her Chihuahua, and they walk together. Sidney stops with a frown as Alison strides off and later sits at his computer. Lawrence throws him a newspaper, and a woman delivers a basket of flowers to Lawrence, who reads the gift tag. Gray-haired Lawrence gives Sidney a prickly look, then walks away, while Alison looks at a tight-lipped Sidney and shrugs as he turns back to his computer. Sidney zips up his fly as he rounds a corner into a white-walled corridor, where he sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching and stops anxiously in his tracks as she stumbles and falls down in a heap in front of him, while Alison watches with bated breath from the end of the corridor. Slack-jawed, Sidney gawks at her, and she raises her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Steam escapes off the pane as doe-eyed Sidney gazes open-mouthed at the passing illuminations, while the glowing summits of skyscrapers shine in the night sky. White blossoms drift on the surface of the rooftop swimming pool as immaculately dressed glitterati mingle and sip bubbly. Sidney strolls over to Alison carrying a platter piled high with finger foods, as three stunning women slink by, and Lawrence wanders off into the throng. Party guests whip out their mobile devices in response to the ring tone, and a glamorous woman in her fifties approaches heavy-featured, debonair Lawrence. Lawrence drifts off with goateed Vincent, as Sidney approaches Rachel, who stands by herself looking out over the metropolis. She looks at him mistrustfully, but then, beaming, she puts down her bubbly. Sidney hands her a napkin and a pen, and she hands him her autograph, making Sidney grin as he rejoins the others. Eleanor gestures to a besuited young man on the opposite side of the pool, who dutifully taps Sophie on the shoulder, and she turns to face Eleanor. Sophie is resplendent in a backless white halter-neck gown, causing Sidney's jaw to drop, while Eleanor waits for her to join them. Pulling up to the poolside, Sophie looks around for an appropriate path but is hemmed in by guests absorbed in conversation. Smiling, she scratches her head, then kicks off her glittering stilettos before stepping fully clothed into the pool. Photographers snap pictures as she lifts her sleek, jet-black tresses over her head and wades gracefully towards Eleanor, clutching her long hair in a bun and smiling flirtatiously for the camera. She pulls herself up out of the water, her wet gown clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean, shapely physique, as Eleanor speaks on her cell phone as they depart. Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside, where a bustling crowd of press photographers ask for Sophie's attention, and Sidney shields his eyes from the glare of the flashing cameras and puts a coat over Sophie's shoulders as they head towards a waiting car. Sidney tries to squeeze into the vehicle beside Sophie and her Chihuahua, and they walk together. Sidney pauses with a frown as Alison strides off and later sits at his computer. Lawrence throws him a newspaper, and a woman delivers a basket of plants to Lawrence, who reads the gift tag. Gray-haired Lawrence gives Sidney a prickly look, then walks away, while Alison looks at a tight-lipped Sidney and shrugs as he turns back to his computer. Sidney zips up his fly as he rounds a corner into a white-walled corridor, where he sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching and stops anxiously in his tracks as she stumbles and falls down in a heap in front of him, while Alison watches with bated breath from the end of the corridor. Slack-jawed, Sidney gawks at her, and she raises her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Steam is leaked off the window by the passing illuminations at which doe-eyed Sidney stares open-mouthed, while the glowing peaks of skyscrapers are gleamed upon in the night sky. On the surface of the rooftop swimming pool, white flowers are floated by immaculately dressed glitterati who mingle and sip champagne. A plate piled high with finger foods is carried by Sidney over to Alison, as three beautiful women slink by, and Lawrence is walked off into the crowd by himself. In response to the ring tone, mobile phones are whipped out by party guests, and heavy-featured, debonair Lawrence is approached by a glamorous woman in her fifties. Goateed Vincent is drifted off with by Lawrence, as Rachel is approached by Sidney, who stands by herself looking out over the city. He is looked at suspiciously by her, but then, beaming, champagne is put down by her. A napkin and a pen are handed to her by Sidney, and her autograph is handed to him by her, making Sidney grin as the others are rejoined by him. A besuited young man on the opposite side of the pool is gestured to by Eleanor, who dutifully taps Sophie on the shoulder, and Eleanor is faced by Sophie. A backless white halter-neck dress resplendently adorns Sophie, causing the jaw of Sidney to drop, while Eleanor waits for her to be joined by Sophie. Sophie's route is looked around for appropriately as she pulls up to the poolside but she is hemmed in by guests engaged in conversation. Her head is scratched by her smilingly, then her glittering high heels are kicked off before she steps fully clothed into the pool. Pictures are taken by photographers as her sleek, jet-black hair is lifted over her head by her and she wades gracefully towards Eleanor, her long hair is clutched by her in a bun, and the camera is smiled at flirtatiously. She is pulled up out of the water by herself, her wet dress clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean, shapely body, as a cell phone is spoken into by Eleanor as they leave. The way is led by Sophie and Eleanor outside, where the attention of Sophie is asked for by a bustling crowd of press photographers, and his eyes are shielded by Sidney from the glare of the flashing cameras and a coat is put over Sophie's shoulders by him as they head towards a waiting car. Beside Sophie and her Chihuahua, Sidney tries to squeeze into the car, and they are walked together by him. A frown stops Sidney as Alison strides off and later a computer is sat at by him. A newspaper is thrown to him by Lawrence, and a basket of flowers is delivered by a woman to Lawrence, who reads the gift tag. Sidney is given a prickly look by gray-haired Lawrence, then he walks away, while a tight-lipped Sidney is looked at by Alison, and she shrugs as the computer is turned back to by him. Rounding a corner into a white-walled corridor, Sidney zips up his fly, where Elizabeth Maddox is seen approaching by him, and in his tracks is stopped anxiously as she stumbles and falls down in a heap in front of him, while the event is watched by Alison with bated breath from the end of the corridor. Slack-jawed, her is gawked at by Sidney, and her eyebrows are raised by her.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Steam condenses on the window as doe-eyed Sidney stares at passing lights, while skyscrapers gleam in the night sky. White flowers float on the rooftop pool as impeccably dressed guests sip champagne. Sidney approaches Alison with a plate of finger foods as three women pass by, and Lawrence vanishes into the crowd. Guests check their phones when a ringtone sounds, and a glamorous woman approaches Lawrence. Lawrence leaves with Vincent, as Sidney approaches Rachel, who looks out over the city. She regards him suspiciously but then smiles, setting down her champagne. Sidney gives her a napkin and pen, and she signs an autograph, making Sidney grin. Eleanor gestures to a young man across the pool, who taps Sophie, stunning in a backless dress, causing Sidney’s jaw to drop. Sophie searches for a path but is blocked by chatting guests. Smiling, she kicks off her heels and steps into the pool, photographers capturing her as she gracefully approaches Eleanor. Emerging from the water with her dress clinging to her curves, Eleanor talks on her phone as they leave. Outside, photographers clamor for Sophie’s attention, and Sidney shields his eyes from flashing cameras, placing a coat over Sophie as they head to a waiting car. Sidney tries to join Sophie and her Chihuahua in the car, but they walk together. Sidney frowns as Alison leaves, then later sits at his computer. Lawrence throws him a newspaper, and a woman delivers flowers to Lawrence, who reads the tag. Lawrence gives Sidney a sharp look, then leaves, while Alison shrugs at Sidney, who returns to his computer. Sidney zips up his fly as he turns into a corridor and sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching. He stops anxiously as she stumbles and falls, while Alison watches from the corridor’s end. Sidney gawks, and she raises her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Steam rises from the window as Sidney, wide-eyed, watches city lights, and skyscraper peaks gleam in the night. White flowers float on the rooftop pool as elegantly dressed guests mingle with champagne. Sidney, carrying finger foods, approaches Alison, as three women pass and Lawrence blends into the crowd. Guests check their phones, and a glamorous woman in her fifties nears Lawrence, who leaves with Vincent. Sidney approaches Rachel, gazing over the city. She initially looks at him suspiciously, but grins, giving him her autograph. Eleanor signals a besuited young man across the pool, who taps Sophie in a halter-neck dress, stunning Sidney. Sophie, unable to navigate the crowd, smiles, kicks off her heels, and enters the pool fully clothed. Photographers capture her as she wades to Eleanor, smiling for the camera. Emerging from the water, her dress clings to her, and Eleanor talks on her phone. Sophie and Eleanor exit to a crowd of photographers, with Sidney shielding his eyes and offering Sophie a coat as they head to a car. Sidney tries to join Sophie, her Chihuahua, and they walk. Sidney pauses as Alison strides off. Lawrence throws him a newspaper, while a woman delivers flowers to Lawrence, who reads the gift tag, gives Sidney a sharp look, and walks away. Alison shrugs at a tight-lipped Sidney turning to his computer. Sidney, rounding a corridor, sees Elizabeth Maddox stumble and fall before him, with Alison watching anxiously. Sidney gawks slack-jawed as Elizabeth raises her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Steam gently leaks off the window, creating a misty veil, as the doe-eyed Sidney, with an open mouth full of wonder, gazes intently at the mesmerizing illuminations passing by, while the glowing peaks of the majestic skyscrapers gleam magnificently in the dark night sky. White flowers serenely drift on the calm surface of the rooftop swimming pool as the immaculately dressed glitterati mingle gracefully and sip golden flutes of champagne. Sidney, moving with a relaxed stride, makes his way over to Alison while holding a plate piled high with an abundant selection of finger foods, as three strikingly beautiful women elegantly slink by, and Lawrence confidently walks off into the bustling crowd. Party guests, prompted by the familiar ring tone, eagerly whip out their mobile phones, and a glamorous woman, likely in her fifties, approaches the heavy-featured, debonair Lawrence. Lawrence gently drifts away with goateed Vincent, while Sidney approaches Rachel, who stands by herself, gazing thoughtfully out over the sprawling city. She regards him with suspicion at first, but then, her face lighting up with a bright smile, she gently sets down her champagne. Sidney, with a polite gesture, hands her a napkin and a pen, and in return, she provides him with her autograph, making Sidney's face break into a wide grin as he joyfully rejoins the others. Eleanor, with a subtle gesture, signals to a besuited young man on the opposite side of the pool, who dutifully taps Sophie on the shoulder, prompting her to turn and face Eleanor. Sophie's elegance is undeniable in a resplendent, backless white halter-neck dress, causing Sidney's jaw to drop in awe, while Eleanor patiently waits for her to join them. As she approaches the poolside, Sophie glances around carefully for an appropriate pathway but finds herself hemmed in by guests fully absorbed in their animated conversations. Smiling playfully, she scratches her head, then confidently kicks off her glittering high heels before stepping fully clothed into the inviting pool. Photographers eagerly capture the moment as she lifts her sleek, jet-black hair over her head, wading gracefully towards Eleanor, clutching her long hair in a stylish bun and smiling flirtatiously for the camera. With elegance, she pulls herself up out of the water, her wet dress clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean and shapely body, while Eleanor continues speaking on her cell phone as they prepare to leave. Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside, where a bustling crowd of eager press photographers clamor for Sophie's attention, and Sidney shields his eyes from the blinding glare of the flashing cameras, tenderly placing a coat over Sophie's shoulders as they head towards the waiting car. Sidney endeavors to squeeze into the car beside Sophie and her tiny Chihuahua, and together, they walk in unison. Sidney halts abruptly with a frown as Alison strides off purposefully, and later, he sits at his computer, deep in thought. Lawrence tosses a newspaper towards him, and a woman arrives, delivering a beautiful basket of flowers to Lawrence, who reads the gift tag with interest. Gray-haired Lawrence shoots Sidney a prickly look, then walks away briskly, while Alison offers Sidney a look of indifference before shrugging as he turns back to his computer. Sidney zips up his fly as he rounds a corner into a stark, white-walled corridor, where he suddenly sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching. He stops anxiously in his tracks as she stumbles and falls down in a heap right in front of him, while Alison watches with bated breath from the other end of the corridor. Slack-jawed, Sidney gazes at her in shock as she raises her eyebrows in response.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Steam rises gently and softly from the window's surface, creating a dreamy, misty veil that blurs the outside world. Meanwhile, the doe-eyed Sidney, with an expression of pure wonderment and his mouth slightly open in awe, gazes deeply and intently at the mesmerizing illuminations as they glide past. Above, the glowing peaks of the majestic skyscrapers gleam brilliantly and magnificently against the dark, velvet night sky. Nearby, pristine white flowers drift serenely and gently on the calm surface of the rooftop swimming pool, as the impeccably dressed glitterati mingle with grace and poise, sipping golden flutes filled with bubbling champagne. Sidney, moving with a relaxed and easy stride, makes his way toward Alison, all the while balancing a plate piled high with an abundant and varied selection of delectable finger foods. As he navigates the crowd, three strikingly beautiful women elegantly slink by, and Lawrence walks confidently and purposefully off into the bustling throng of party guests. These guests, prompted by the familiar sound of a ringing tone, eagerly whip out their mobile phones. A glamorous woman, likely in her fifties and exuding charm, approaches the heavy-featured and debonair Lawrence. Lawrence, with a gentle and smooth movement, drifts away with goateed Vincent, while Sidney approaches Rachel, who stands alone, gazing thoughtfully out over the vast, sprawling city. Initially, she regards him with a tinge of suspicion, but then her face transforms, lighting up with a bright and genuine smile. She gently sets down her champagne glass, as Sidney, with a courteous gesture, hands her a napkin and a pen. In return, she provides him with her autograph, causing Sidney's face to break into a wide, joyful grin as he rejoins the others. Eleanor, with a subtle and discreet gesture, signals to a young man dressed in a sharp suit on the opposite side of the pool. He dutifully taps Sophie on the shoulder, prompting her to turn and face Eleanor. Sophie's elegance is unmistakable, as she is adorned in a resplendent, backless white halter-neck dress, captivating Sidney and causing his jaw to drop in awe. Eleanor patiently waits for Sophie to join their group. As Sophie approaches the poolside, she glances around carefully, searching for an appropriate pathway but finds herself hemmed in by guests deeply absorbed in their animated and lively conversations. Smiling playfully, she reaches up to scratch her head, then confidently kicks off her glittering high heels before stepping fully clothed into the inviting waters of the pool. Photographers eagerly capture this spontaneous moment as she lifts her sleek, jet-black hair over her head, wading gracefully towards Eleanor. She clutches her long hair in a stylish bun and smiles flirtatiously for the cameras. With elegance and poise, she pulls herself up out of the water, her wet dress clinging closely to the sinuous curves of her lean and shapely body. Eleanor, meanwhile, continues speaking on her cell phone as they prepare to make their exit. Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside to where a bustling crowd of eager press photographers clamors for Sophie's attention. Sidney shields his eyes from the blinding glare of the flashing cameras' relentless lights, tenderly placing a coat over Sophie's shoulders as they make their way toward the waiting car. Sidney endeavors to squeeze into the car beside Sophie and her tiny Chihuahua, and together, they move in unison. Sidney halts abruptly, a frown crossing his face, as Alison strides off purposefully. Later, he sits at his computer, deep in contemplation. Lawrence, meanwhile, tosses a newspaper towards him, and a woman arrives, delivering a beautiful, fragrant basket of flowers to Lawrence. He reads the accompanying gift tag with keen interest. Gray-haired Lawrence shoots Sidney a prickly, sharp look, then walks away briskly, while Alison offers Sidney a look of indifference before shrugging as he turns back to his computer. Sidney zips up his fly as he rounds a corner into a stark, white-walled corridor. Suddenly, he sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching. Anxious, he stops in his tracks just as she stumbles and falls into a heap right in front of him. From the other end of the corridor, Alison watches with bated breath. Slack-jawed, Sidney gazes at Elizabeth in shock as she raises her eyebrows in response.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Steam gently seeps onto the inside of the window, forming a delicate mist as doe-eyed Sidney gazes in awe, his mouth slightly agape, captivated by the luminous glow of the city lights that dance by outside, while the peaks of towering skyscrapers shimmer brilliantly against the backdrop of the night sky. In another part of the scene, white flowers drift serenely on the surface of a rooftop swimming pool, creating a picturesque scene as impeccably dressed partygoers, with a certain level of glamour, mingle amongst themselves while casually sipping champagne. Amidst the lively gathering, Sidney moves with a leisurely stride towards Alison, balancing a plate teeming with an assortment of finger foods, just as three stunning women glide past him with an air of elegance, while Lawrence, with purposeful steps, disappears into the throng. The party atmosphere is punctuated by the sudden chorus of ringtones as guests promptly reach for their mobile phones, and a strikingly glamorous woman, noticeably in her fifties, approaches the debonair yet ruggedly handsome Lawrence. As Lawrence gradually meanders away, accompanied by the goateed Vincent, Sidney directs his steps towards Rachel, who stands apart, gazing pensively over the cityscape. Initially, Rachel regards Sidney with suspicion, but her demeanor shifts as a beaming smile lights up her face, leading her to set aside her glass of champagne. Sidney, with a friendly gesture, offers her a napkin and pen, which she uses to jot down her autograph, causing Sidney to break into a broad grin before he makes his way back to the others. Eleanor, with a subtle nod, signals to a sharply-dressed young man situated across the pool, prompting him to tap Sophie on the shoulder to gain her attention. Sophie, radiant in a stunning backless white halter-neck dress, turns to face Eleanor, catching Sidney's eye, who reacts with slack-jawed astonishment at her captivating appearance while Eleanor waits expectantly for Sophie to join them. Sophie makes her way towards the poolside, her eyes scanning for a viable path, yet she finds herself confined by guests deeply immersed in their conversations. With a playful smile, she lightly scratches her head as a thoughtful pause precedes her decision to discard her glittering high heels, and she then confidently steps, still fully clothed, into the inviting waters of the pool. The scene quickly captures the attention of photographers, who eagerly snap away as Sophie gently gathers her sleek, jet-black hair into an elegant bun while wading gracefully through the water, her face adorned with a flirtatious smile directed at the cameras. Emerging from the pool, she lifts herself out with effortless grace, her dress clinging to the contours of her lithe, shapely form as Eleanor, speaking animatedly on her cell phone, prepares to leave with her. Together, Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside, where they are met by a bustling crowd of press photographers, whose eager requests for Sophie's attention create a dazzling display of flashing lights. Sidney, momentarily blinded by the bright flashes, raises a hand to shield his eyes as he gently drapes a coat over Sophie's shoulders, guiding her towards a waiting car. As they approach the car, Sidney attempts to fit himself into the seat beside Sophie and her Chihuahua, but instead, they end up walking together. Sidney, his expression clouded with concern, halts as he watches Alison stride away purposefully and later finds himself seated at his computer. Lawrence tosses a newspaper in his direction, and shortly thereafter, a woman arrives to deliver a basket of flowers to Lawrence. Intrigued, Lawrence reads the message on the accompanying gift tag, while his gray-haired features display a stern, prickly expression directed at Sidney before he turns away. Alison observes Sidney, his lips pressed tightly, and with an indifferent gesture, she shrugs as Sidney refocuses on the contents of his computer screen. Sidney, with a quick, discreet motion, zips up his fly as he rounds a corner and steps into a pristine white-walled corridor. There, his stride comes to an abrupt halt as he notices Elizabeth Maddox approaching, and a wave of anxiety washes over him, causing him to stop in his tracks with a look of apprehension. In a sudden turn of events, Elizabeth stumbles and collapses into an untidy heap directly in front of him, while Alison, observing from the end of the corridor, holds her breath in anticipation. Sidney, his jaw hanging slack in disbelief, stares at Elizabeth, who responds with a subtle lift of her eyebrows, completing the poignant moment.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Steam fogs the window as Sidney, captivated by the night skyline's illuminated skyscrapers, watches in awe. At a rooftop party, white flowers adorn the pool where elegantly dressed guests mingle with champagne. Sidney brings a plate of finger foods to Alison, passing by three stunning women as Lawrence disappears into the crowd. When a phone rings, party-goers reach for their mobile devices, and a glamorous woman approaches Lawrence, who then strolls off with Vincent. Sidney approaches Rachel, who initially appears suspicious but soon smiles and sets down her champagne. He hands her a napkin and pen for an autograph, which she provides, making Sidney grin before he rejoins the party. Eleanor signals a young man across the pool to notify Sophie, who stands out in a striking backless white dress, causing Sidney to gape as Eleanor beckons her. Sophie assesses the crowded poolside and, finding no clear path, opts to kick off her heels and wade through the pool. Photographers capture her as she emerges, displaying her wet dress, and joins Eleanor, who is on her phone as they exit. Outside, they face a throng of photographers. Sidney shields his eyes from camera flashes and drapes a coat over Sophie's shoulders as they move to a waiting car. Trying to join Sophie and her Chihuahua in the vehicle, Sidney hesitates as Alison departs, later sitting at his computer. Lawrence tosses him a newspaper as a woman delivers flowers to Lawrence, who reads the tag, and with a stern look at Sidney, turns away. Alison shrugs at Sidney's tight-lipped expression as he resumes his work. Sidney, after zipping up, encounters Elizabeth Maddox in a corridor, halting anxiously as she stumbles and falls before him; Alison watches breathlessly from a distance as Sidney stands agape, and Elizabeth raises her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Steam leaks off the window as doe-eyed Sidney, who recently moved to the bustling city known for its iconic skyline, stares open-mouthed at the passing illuminations, while the glowing peaks of skyscrapers, like those in Midtown Manhattan, gleam in the night sky. White flowers, commonly used in high-end events for their elegance, float on the surface of the rooftop swimming pool as immaculately dressed glitterati, referring to the fashionable elite often seen at A-list gatherings, mingle and sip champagne. Sidney saunters over to Alison carrying a plate piled high with finger foods, reminiscent of the hors d'oeuvres served at prestigious parties, as three beautiful women slink by, reminiscent of fashion models from a Paris runway, and Lawrence walks off into the crowd. Party guests whip out their mobile phones in response to the ring tone, signaling an expected call at such elite gatherings, and a glamorous woman in her fifties, known for her roles in classic films, approaches heavy-featured, debonair Lawrence. Lawrence drifts off with goateed Vincent, who is an up-and-coming artist celebrated for his provocative installations, as Sidney approaches Rachel, who stands by herself looking out over the city, admiring the famous skyline. She looks at him suspiciously, recalling their last encounter at a similar event, but then, beaming, she puts down her champagne. Sidney hands her a napkin and a pen, knowing she's renowned for her writing, and she hands him her autograph, making Sidney grin as he rejoins the others. Eleanor gestures to a besuited young man on the opposite side of the pool, who dutifully taps Sophie on the shoulder, and she turns to face Eleanor. Sophie is resplendent in a backless white halter-neck dress by a renowned fashion designer, causing Sidney's jaw to drop, while Eleanor waits for her to join them. Pulling up to the poolside, Sophie looks around for an appropriate route but is hemmed in by guests absorbed in conversation about the latest Hollywood blockbuster. Smiling, she scratches her head, then kicks off her glittering high heels, custom-designed by an exclusive couturier, before stepping fully clothed into the pool. Photographers take pictures as she lifts her sleek, jet-black hair over her head and wades gracefully towards Eleanor, clutching her long hair in a bun and smiling flirtatiously for the camera, much like a scene from a fashion magazine. She pulls herself up out of the water, her wet dress clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean, shapely body, as Eleanor speaks on her cell phone, likely discussing business with a high-profile client, as they leave. Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside, where a bustling crowd of press photographers ask for Sophie's attention, and Sidney shields his eyes from the glare of the flashing cameras and puts a coat over Sophie's shoulders, protecting her from the night chill, as they head towards a waiting car. Sidney tries to squeeze into the car beside Sophie and her Chihuahua, a small dog often spotted in celebrity circles, and they walk together. Sidney stops with a frown as Alison strides off to network with an influential producer, and later sits at his computer, researching the latest trends for an upcoming article. Lawrence throws him a newspaper, noting the headline about the event's highlight, and a woman delivers a basket of exotic flowers to Lawrence, who reads the gift tag from a secret admirer. Gray-haired Lawrence gives Sidney a prickly look, recalling a recent disagreement, then walks away, while Alison looks at a tight-lipped Sidney and shrugs, silently acknowledging the tension, as he turns back to his computer. Sidney zips up his fly as he rounds a corner into a white-walled corridor, part of the venue's labyrinthine layout, where he sees Elizabeth Maddox, a famous actress known for her dramatic roles, approaching and stops anxiously in his tracks as she stumbles and falls down in a heap in front of him, while Alison watches with bated breath from the end of the corridor. Slack-jawed, Sidney gawks at her, and she raises her eyebrows, recognizing his surprise.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Steam leaks off the window as doeeyed Sidney stares openmouthed at the passing illuminations while the glowing peaks of skyscrapers gleam in the night sky. White flowers float on the surface of the rooftop swimming pool as immaculately dressed glitterati mingle and sip champagne. Sidney saunters over to Alison carrying a plate piled high with finger foods as three beautiful women slink by and Lawrence walks off into the crowd. Party guests whip out their mobile phones in response to the ring tone and a glamorous woman in her fifties approaches heavyfeatured debonair Lawrence. Lawrence drifts off with goateed Vincent as Sidney approaches Rachel who stands by herself looking out over the city. She looks at him suspiciously but then beaming she puts down her champagne. Sidney hands her a napkin and a pen and she hands him her autograph making Sidney grin as he rejoins the others. Eleanor gestures to a besuited young man on the opposite side of the pool who dutifully taps Sophie on the shoulder and she turns to face Eleanor. Sophie is resplendent in a backless white halterneck dress causing Sidney's jaw to drop while Eleanor waits for her to join them. Pulling up to the poolside Sophie looks around for an appropriate route but is hemmed in by guests absorbed in conversation. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. Smiling she scratches her head then kicks off her glittering high heels before stepping fully clothed into the pool. Photographers take pictures as she lifts her sleek jetblack hair over her head and wades gracefully towards Eleanor clutching her long hair in a bun and smiling flirtatiously for the camera. She pulls herself up out of the water her wet dress clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean shapely body as Eleanor speaks on her cell phone as they leave. Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside where a bustling crowd of press photographers ask for Sophie's attention and Sidney shields his eyes from the glare of the flashing cameras and puts a coat over Sophie's shoulders as they head towards a waiting car. Sidney tries to squeeze into the car beside Sophie and her Chihuahua and they walk together. Sidney stops with a frown as Alison strides off and later sits at his computer. Lawrence throws him a newspaper and a woman delivers a basket of flowers to Lawrence who reads the gift tag. Grayhaired Lawrence gives Sidney a prickly look then walks away while Alison looks at a tightlipped Sidney and shrugs as he turns back to his computer. Sidney zips up his fly as he rounds a corner into a whitewalled corridor where he sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching and stops anxiously in his tracks as she stumbles and falls down in a heap in front of him while Alison watches with bated breath from the end of the corridor. Slackjawed Sidney gawks at her and she raises her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: Steam leaks off the window as doe-eyed the poodle stares open-mouthed at the passing illuminations, while the glowing peaks of skyscrapers gleam in the night sky. White flowers float on the surface of the rooftop swimming pool as immaculately dressed penguins mingle and sip champagne. The poodle saunters over to the squirrel carrying a plate piled high with finger foods, as three beautiful iguanas slink by, and the giraffe walks off into the crowd. Party guests whip out their mobile phones in response to the ring tone, and a glamorous cheetah in her fifties approaches heavy-featured, debonair the giraffe. The giraffe drifts off with goateed the walrus, as the poodle approaches the hamster, who stands by herself looking out over the city. The hamster looks at the poodle suspiciously, but then, beaming, she puts down her champagne. The poodle hands her a napkin and a pen, and she hands the poodle her autograph, making the poodle grin as it rejoins the others. The eagle gestures to a besuited young tree on the opposite side of the pool, who dutifully taps the zebra on the shoulder, and she turns to face the eagle. The zebra is resplendent in a backless white halter-neck dress, causing the poodle's jaw to drop, while the eagle waits for her to join them. Pulling up to the poolside, the zebra looks around for an appropriate route but is hemmed in by guests absorbed in conversation. Smiling, she scratches her head, then kicks off her glittering high heels before stepping fully clothed into the pool. Photographers take pictures as she lifts her sleek, jet-black hair over her head and wades gracefully towards the eagle, clutching her long hair in a bun and smiling flirtatiously for the camera. She pulls herself up out of the water, her wet dress clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean, shapely body, as the eagle speaks on her cell phone as they leave. The zebra and the eagle lead the way outside, where a bustling crowd of press photographers ask for the zebra's attention, and the poodle shields its eyes from the glare of the flashing cameras and puts a coat over the zebra's shoulders as they head towards a waiting car. The poodle tries to squeeze into the car beside the zebra and her Chihuahua, and they walk together. The poodle stops with a frown as the squirrel strides off and later sits at its computer. The giraffe throws the poodle a newspaper, and a penguin delivers a basket of flowers to the giraffe, who reads the gift tag. Gray-haired the giraffe gives the poodle a prickly look, then walks away, while the squirrel looks at a tight-lipped the poodle and shrugs as it turns back to its computer. The poodle zips up its fly as it rounds a corner into a white-walled corridor, where it sees the koala approaching and stops anxiously in its tracks as she stumbles and falls down in a heap in front of it, while the squirrel watches with bated breath from the end of the corridor. Slack-jawed, the poodle gawks at her, and she raises her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Steam leaks off the window as doe-eyed Sidney stares open-mouthed at the passing kites, while the glowing peaks of lighthouses gleam in the night sky. White flags float on the surface of the rooftop bistro as immaculately dressed glitterati mingle and sip root beer. Sidney saunters over to Alison carrying a plate piled high with desserts, as three beautiful women slink by, and Lawrence walks off into the crowd. Party guests whip out their harmonicas in response to the wind chime, and a glamorous woman in her fifties approaches heavy-featured, debonair Lawrence. Lawrence drifts off with goateed Vincent, as Sidney approaches Rachel, who stands by herself looking out over the stadium. She looks at him suspiciously, but then, beaming, she puts down her root beer. Sidney hands her a coaster and a whistle, and she hands him her bracelet, making Sidney grin as he rejoins the others. Eleanor gestures to a besuited young man on the opposite side of the bistro, who dutifully taps Sophie on the elbow, and she turns to face Eleanor. Sophie is resplendent in a backless white backpack, causing Sidney's jaw to drop, while Eleanor waits for her to join them. Pulling up to the bistro, Sophie looks around for an appropriate route but is hemmed in by guests absorbed in conversation. Smiling, she scratches her nose, then kicks off her glittering sneakers before stepping fully clothed into the bistro. Photographers take pictures as she lifts her sleek, jet-black scarf over her head and wades gracefully towards Eleanor, clutching her long scarf in a bun and smiling flirtatiously for the camera. She pulls herself up out of the juice, her wet backpack clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean, shapely body, as Eleanor speaks on her walkie-talkie as they leave. Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside, where a bustling crowd of press musicians ask for Sophie's attention, and Sidney shields his eyes from the glare of the flashing fireworks and puts a blanket over Sophie's shoulders as they head towards a waiting trolley. Sidney tries to squeeze into the trolley beside Sophie and her parrot, and they walk together. Sidney stops with a frown as Alison strides off and later sits at his piano. Lawrence throws him a magazine, and a woman delivers a basket of apples to Lawrence, who reads the card. Gray-haired Lawrence gives Sidney a prickly look, then walks away, while Alison looks at a tight-lipped Sidney and shrugs as he turns back to his piano. Sidney zips up his suitcase as he rounds a corner into a red-bricked corridor, where he sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching and stops anxiously in his tracks as she stumbles and falls down in a heap in front of him, while Alison watches with bated breath from the end of the corridor. Slack-jawed, Sidney gawks at her, and she raises her magnifying glass.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Steam drifts off the window as doe-eyed Sidney gapes wide-eyed at the passing illuminations, while the glowing peaks of skyscrapers shimmer in the night sky. White flowers bob on the surface of the rooftop swimming pool as immaculately dressed glitterati chat and gulp champagne. Sidney meanders over to Alison carrying a plate piled high with finger foods, as three beautiful women glide by, and Lawrence slips away into the crowd. Party guests whip out their mobile phones in response to the ring tone, and a glamorous woman in her fifties steps up to heavy-featured, debonair Lawrence. Lawrence meanders off with goateed Vincent, as Sidney nears Rachel, who stands by herself gazing out over the city. She glances at him suspiciously, but then, smiling, she sets down her champagne. Sidney offers her a napkin and a pen, and she passes him her autograph, making Sidney beam as he returns to the others. Eleanor signals to a besuited young man on the opposite side of the pool, who obligingly nudges Sophie on the shoulder, and she pivots to face Eleanor. Sophie is stunning in a backless white halter-neck dress, causing Sidney's jaw to clench, while Eleanor waits for her to join them. Approaching the poolside, Sophie searches around for an appropriate route but is blocked in by guests engrossed in conversation. Grinning, she ruffles her hair, then slips off her glittering high heels before diving fully clothed into the pool. Photographers snap pictures as she swings her sleek, jet-black hair over her head and swims elegantly towards Eleanor, holding her long hair in a bun and smiling playfully for the camera. She pulls herself up out of the water, her wet dress hugging the sinuous curves of her lean, shapely body, as Eleanor chats on her cell phone as they exit. Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside, where a bustling crowd of press photographers shout for Sophie's attention, and Sidney squints from the glare of the flashing cameras and drapes a coat over Sophie's shoulders as they move towards a waiting car. Sidney attempts to squeeze into the car beside Sophie and her Chihuahua, and they wander together. Sidney halts with a frown as Alison strides off and later sits at his computer. Lawrence tosses him a newspaper, and a woman hands a basket of flowers to Lawrence, who examines the gift tag. Gray-haired Lawrence gives Sidney a piercing look, then strides away, while Alison glances at a tight-lipped Sidney and shrugs as he turns back to his computer. Sidney buttons his shirt as he rounds a corner into a white-walled corridor, where he notices Elizabeth Maddox approaching and pauses anxiously in his tracks as she trips and collapses in a heap in front of him, while Alison observes with bated breath from the end of the corridor. Slack-jawed, Sidney stares at her, and she arches her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Mist trickles off the mannequin as wide-eyed Oliver stares slack-jawed at the rolling apparitions, while the shining tops of windmills shimmer in the dawn fog. Black leaves float on the edge of the hillside skating rink as casually dressed travelers mingle and sip juice. Oliver strides over to Marcus carrying a tray piled high with sandwiches, as seven elegant men slither by, and Roger drifts off into the throng. Concertgoers whip out their tablets in response to the chime, and an elegant child in her thirties approaches round-faced, dashing Roger. Roger wanders off with beardless Charlie, as Oliver approaches Lucy, who stands alone gazing out over the mountains. He looks at her curiously, but then, grinning, he puts down his juice. Oliver hands her a brochure and a bookmark, and she hands him her portrait, making Oliver chuckle as he reenters the group. Fiona signals to a bespectacled old woman on the opposite side of the rink, who obediently nudges Harry on the ankle, and he turns to face Fiona. Harry is stunning in a closed-back blue satin tie, causing Oliver's eyes to widen, while Fiona waits for him to join them. Moving toward the rinkside, Harry looks around for a suitable path but is blocked by children engrossed in conversation. Smiling, he scratches his elbow, then kicks off his worn flip-flops before stepping fully dressed onto the ice. Reporters snap photos as he lifts his curly, auburn wig over his head and glides cautiously towards Fiona, holding his short wig in a braid and smiling shyly for the camera. He pulls himself up out of the ice, his wet shoes clinging to the straight lines of his broad, muscular frame, as Fiona chats on her tablet as they depart. Harry and Fiona lead the march inside, where a hurrying crowd of news agents demand Harry's autograph, and Oliver shields his ears from the din of the bustling crowd and puts a scarf over Harry's elbows as they move towards a parked van. Oliver attempts to step into the van beside Harry and his Persian, and they glide forward together. Oliver halts with confusion as Marcus sprints off and later types at his printer. Roger tosses him a brochure, and a child delivers a box of chocolates to Roger, who reads the postage stamp. Bald Roger gives Oliver a stern glance, then ambles away, while Marcus gazes at a tight-lipped Oliver and sighs as he turns back to his printer. Oliver fastens his laces as he rounds a corner into a blue-tiled atrium, where he sees Patricia Collins arriving and halts nervously in place as she slips and tumbles down in a pile in front of him, while Marcus observes with held breath from the start of the atrium. Open-mouthed, Oliver gawks at him, and he raises his shoulders.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Steam evaporates off the window as wide-eyed Marvin glances agape at the passing silhouettes, while the towering domes of skyscrapers shimmer in the night sky. Red balloons drift on the surface of the rooftop swimming pool as elegantly clad intellectuals chatter and sip espresso. Marvin ambles over to Gloria carrying a tray stacked with sweet treats, as three tall gentlemen slide by, and Amelia wanders off into the gathering. Event attendees whip out their mobile phones in response to the doorbell, and a stylish man in his thirties approaches round-faced, sophisticated Amelia. Amelia glides off with bearded Nathan, as Marvin nears Laura, who stands by herself gazing out over the city. He glances at her cautiously, but then, grinning, she sets down her espresso. Marvin offers her a handkerchief and a brush, and she gives him her portrait, making Marvin beam as he rejoins the others. Jasper indicates to a bespectacled young woman on the opposite side of the pool, who briskly nudges Leo on the shoulder, and he turns to face Jasper. Leo is dashing in a pinstriped black tuxedo, causing Marvin's eyes to widen, while Jasper waits for him to join them. Stopping at the poolside, Leo surveys for an accessible path but is encircled by guests engrossed in conversation. Chuckling, he scratches his chin, then slips off his shimmery wingtip oxfords before diving fully dressed into the pool. Journalists snap photos as he flips his thick, chestnut waves over his head and paddles elegantly towards Jasper, gathering his hair in a ponytail and smiling coyly for the camera. He hoists himself out of the water, his wet tuxedo adhering to the muscular lines of his slender, toned figure, as Jasper speaks on his cell phone as they depart. Leo and Jasper lead the way outdoors, where an energetic throng of media photographers clamor for Leo's attention, and Marvin shields his eyes from the brightness of the flashing cameras and drapes a scarf over Leo's shoulders as they proceed towards a waiting bicycle. Marvin attempts to squeeze onto the bicycle beside Leo and his Siamese cat, and they skip together. Marvin halts with a grimace as Gloria marches off and later lounges at his piano. Amelia tosses him a magazine, and a man delivers a basket of fruits to Amelia, who looks at the note. Balding Amelia gives Marvin a sharp look, then saunters away, while Gloria glances at a tight-lipped Marvin and shrugs as he turns back to his piano. Marvin buttons up his jacket as he rounds a corner into a blue-tiled corridor, where he sees Andrea Clark approaching and freezes nervously in his steps as she trips and lands in a pile in front of him, while Gloria watches with anticipation from the end of the corridor. Wide-eyed, Marvin stares at her, and she smirks wryly.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Mist billows off the mirror as doe-eyed Sidney gapes wide-eyed at the twinkling shadows, while the shimmering tips of mountains glisten in the morning mist. Pink balloons drift on the surface of the rooftop dance floor as casually dressed tourists wander and sip smoothies. Sidney ambles over to Alison holding a basket filled with muffins, as three handsome men stride by, and Lawrence skips off into the crowd. Party guests pull out their cameras in response to the theme song, and a dazzling man in his fifties approaches heavy-featured, elegant Lawrence. Lawrence glides away with bearded Vincent, as Sidney nears Rachel, who stands alone gazing out at the ocean. She regards him skeptically, but then, smiling, she places down her smoothie. Sidney hands her a coaster and a marker, and she gives him her business card, making Sidney beam as he rejoins the others. Eleanor motions to an elegantly attired young woman on the opposite side of the dance floor, who dutifully taps Sophie on the arm, and she turns to look at Eleanor. Sophie is stunning in a flowing red sundress, causing Sidney's heart to skip a beat, while Eleanor waits for her to join them. Strolling up to the dance floor, Sophie looks around for an open path but is blocked by guests engaged in chatting. Grinning, she adjusts her glasses, then slips off her sparkling sandals before stepping fully dressed onto the floor. Artists sketch details as she lifts her silky, golden scarf over her head and twirls gracefully towards Eleanor, clutching her scarf in a knot and posing playfully for the painter. She climbs out of the circle, her damp dress adhering to the smooth lines of her slender, graceful figure, as Eleanor speaks on her walkie-talkie as they depart. Sophie and Eleanor guide the way outside, where a bustling group of journalists request Sophie's attention, and Sidney shields his face from the brightness of the flickering lights and drapes a scarf over Sophie's shoulders as they head towards a waiting bicycle. Sidney attempts to hop onto the bike beside Sophie and her parrot, and they stroll together. Sidney halts with confusion as Alison marches off and later reclines at his laptop. Lawrence tosses him a magazine, and a man delivers a basket of pastries to Lawrence, who reads the note. Silver-haired Lawrence gives Sidney a prickly look, then saunters away, while Alison gazes at a tight-lipped Sidney and shrugs as he returns to his laptop. Sidney fastens his watch as he rounds a corner into a beige-walled hallway, where he sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching and halts nervously in his tracks as she slips and crumples into a pile before him, while Alison watches intently from the end of the hallway. Wide-eyed, Sidney stares at her, and she widens her eyes.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Steam swirls off the painting as goggle-eyed Charlie glances open-mouthed at the fleeing shadows, while the shimmering slopes of mountains twinkle in the dawn. Pink clouds drift on the horizon of the garden pond as elegantly clad actors gather and nibble on biscuits. Charlie skips over to Brenda carrying a bucket filled with pebbles, as five tall gentlemen bounce by, and Winston scuttles off into the throng. Circus performers snap out their umbrellas in response to the chime, and a sophisticated octogenarian ambles toward sullen-featured, dashing Winston. Winston floats away with bearded Martin, as Charlie meanders to Monica, who sits by herself dreaming over the ocean. She peers at him warily, but then, grinning, she sets down her lemonade. Charlie hands her a paintbrush and a canvas, and she gives him her sketch, making Charlie chuckle as he rejoins the group. Lydia waves to a tuxedoed older woman on the far side of the fountain, who obediently nudges Hannah on the arm, and she turns to view Lydia. Hannah is dazzling in a sequined red ball gown, causing Charlie's eyes to widen, while Lydia waits for her to approach. Strolling up to the fountain, Hannah gazes around for an open path but is surrounded by dancers engaged in chatter. Smiling, she taps her chin, then tosses off her sparkling sandals before jumping fully clothed into the fountain. Artists capture moments as she flaunts her curly, chestnut hair above her face and strides contentedly toward Lydia, clutching her flowing hair in a twist and grinning slyly for the audience. She hoists herself up from the water, her wet gown sticking to the graceful lines of her slender, athletic frame, as Lydia whispers on her walkie-talkie as they depart. Hannah and Lydia pave the way indoors, where a bustling crowd of reporters demand Hannah's attention, and Charlie shields his face from the brightness of the flashing lights and places a scarf around Hannah's neck as they march towards a waiting scooter. Charlie tries to squeeze into the scooter next to Hannah and her parakeet, and they glide together. Charlie pauses with a pout as Brenda skips off and afterward relaxes in his library. Winston pitches him a scroll, and an owl delivers a box of stones to Winston, who inspects the attached note. White-haired Winston shoots Charlie a thorny glare, then strides away, while Brenda glances at a tight-jawed Charlie and shrugs as he turns back to his library. Charlie tightens his belt as he swings around a corner into a checkered hallway, where he spots Olivia Turner arriving and halts nervously in his path as she tips and sprawls down in a pile before him, while Brenda observes with bated breath from the tip of the hallway. Slack-jawed, Charlie gapes at her, and she arches her eyebrows.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Sidney, intrigued by the gleaming skyscrapers, attends a glamorous rooftop party. He weaves through guests, including Alison and Lawrence, and gets an autograph from Rachel. Eleanor signals for Sophie, stunning in a white dress, who wades into the pool, captivating photographers with her graceful exit. As the press clamors for attention, Sidney covers Sophie with a coat before they head to a car. Lawrence gives Sidney a hard stare after receiving flowers, and Sidney, back at his computer, is caught off guard when Elizabeth Maddox falls in front of him, observed by Alison. Sidney is left speechless, watching Elizabeth with wide eyes.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: Slackjawed Sidney gawks at her and she raises her eyebrows Sidney zips up his fly as he rounds a corner into a whitewalled corridor where he sees Elizabeth Maddox approaching and stops anxiously in his tracks as she stumbles and falls down in a heap in front of him while Alison watches with bated breath from the end of the corridor Grayhaired Lawrence gives Sidney a prickly look then walks away while Alison looks at a tightlipped Sidney and shrugs as he turns back to his computer Lawrence throws him a newspaper and a woman delivers a basket of flowers to Lawrence who reads the gift tag Sidney stops with a frown as Alison strides off and later sits at his computer Sidney tries to squeeze into the car beside Sophie and her Chihuahua and they walk together Sophie and Eleanor lead the way outside where a bustling crowd of press photographers ask for Sophie's attention and Sidney shields his eyes from the glare of the flashing cameras and puts a coat over Sophie's shoulders as they head towards a waiting car She pulls herself up out of the water her wet dress clinging to the sinuous curves of her lean shapely body as Eleanor speaks on her cell phone as they leave Photographers take pictures as she lifts her sleek jetblack hair over her head and wades gracefully towards Eleanor clutching her long hair in a bun and smiling flirtatiously for the camera Smiling she scratches her head then kicks off her glittering high heels before stepping fully clothed into the pool Pulling up to the poolside Sophie looks around for an appropriate route but is hemmed in by guests absorbed in conversation Sophie is resplendent in a backless white halterneck dress causing Sidney's jaw to drop while Eleanor waits for her to join them Eleanor gestures to a besuited young man on the opposite side of the pool who dutifully taps Sophie on the shoulder and she turns to face Eleanor Sidney hands her a napkin and a pen and she hands him her autograph making Sidney grin as he rejoins the others She looks at him suspiciously but then beaming she puts down her champagne Lawrence drifts off with goateed Vincent as Sidney approaches Rachel who stands by herself looking out over the city Party guests whip out their mobile phones in response to the ring tone and a glamorous woman in her fifties approaches heavyfeatured debonair Lawrence Sidney saunters over to Alison carrying a plate piled high with finger foods as three beautiful women slink by and Lawrence walks off into the crowd White flowers float on the surface of the rooftop swimming pool as immaculately dressed glitterati mingle and sip champagne Steam leaks off the window as doeeyed Sidney stares openmouthed at the passing illuminations while the glowing peaks of skyscrapers gleam in the night sky
